seasons.title: Keep Your Head Up, Kid: The Don Cherry Story

episodes.synopsis: Before rising to national fame, Cherry's early childhood, solid marriage and passion for the game helped him persevere beyond minor league obscurity.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As a coach for the Rochester Americans, Cherry's over-the-top style and skill led him to a job with the Boston Bruins -- and to legend status.
episodes.title: Part 2

video.title: Keep Your Head Up Kid: The Don Cherry Story - Part 1
video.synopsis: From minor league hockey player to Boston Bruins coach, outspoken legend Don "Grapes" Cherry is the focus of this intimate miniseries.
